title: Scorpio Nights [1985 - Philippines] Pinoy
description:
Scorpio Nights (1985 - Philippines)

Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117568/


2 Award Wins & 3 Award Nominations

In a shabby apartment in the slums of Manila a student resides above the room of a security guard and his wife. Every day, the husband goes home, eats his dinner, washes the dishes, goes straight to bed and makes love with his wife. The student plays Peeping Tom and every night observes through a hole in his floorboard. Unable to control his urges, he goes to the room of the wife where he does the same things that the girl's husband does to her with no resistance. They fall in love with each other and the husband finds out.


Video: XviD, 464x352, 29.970 fps, 699 Kbps, 01h59m28s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 101 kbps

VHSRip, Filipino and Tagalog audio, optional subtitles English and Spanish
